reviewText: I showed clips from this show to my youth exercise classes this summer.
I often use Bill Nye as part of a review before a test or even as a beginning to a new unit of study to get students wanting to learn more.
super duper short and not worth the $20 I paid for it. if you can get one for less than $5 I would buy it.
used this video in the car and it really taught my children a lot. they enjoyed watching the videos. kudos
The video was excellent. My students enjoyed every part, especially the music video at the end. They had to try it out themselves.
Who could make digestion and respiration an interesting topic that would hold a third grader's interest??? Bill Nye the Science guy!!
I wish they had included excretion,but the first stages of digestion are well covered. As always, the models presented clarify the information and the humor engages the children.

As usual he does it again, this is wonderful.
I used this in my class in the beginning and the end of the chapter on the digestive system. It did the trick.
